about.author: Tim Stephenson
about.name: Physical Activity 1
about.title: Physical Activity Questionnaire
about.instructions:
We are trying to find out about your level of physical activity from the last 7 days (in the last week).

Remember:

  • There are no right and wrong answers — this is not a test.
  • Please answer all the questions as honestly and accurately as you can — this is very important.

questions.name: veryActivePE
questions.label: In the last 7 days, during your physical education (PE) classes, how often were you very active (playing hard, running, jumping, throwing)?

questions.name: breakActivity
questions.label: In the last 7 days, what did you do most of the time at break time?
optionNames: Ran or played a little bit
Ran around and played quite a bit
Ran and played hard most of the time

questions.name: lunchActivity
questions.label: In the last 7 days, what did you normally do at lunch (besides eating lunch)?
optionNames: Ran or played a little bit
Ran around and played quite a bit
Ran and played hard most of the time

questions.name: afterSchoolActivity
questions.label: In the last 7 days, on how many days after school, did you do sports, dance, or play games in which you were very active?

questions.name: weekendActivity
questions.label: On the last weekend, how many times did you do sports, dance, or play games in which you were very active?

questions.name: freeTimeActivity
questions.label: Which one of the following describes you best for the last 7 days? Read all five statements before deciding on the one answer that describes you.
optionNames: All or most of my free time was spent doing things that involve little physical effort
I sometimes (1 or 2 times last week) did physical things in my free time (e.g. played sports, went running, swimming, bike riding, did aerobics)
I often (3 or 4 times last week) did physical things in my free time
I quite often (5 or 6 times last week) did physical things in my free time
I very often (7 or more times last week) did physical things in my free time

questions.name: blockersBreaks
questions.label: What stops you being physically active at Break Times/Lunch Time? (please give examples)

questions.name: blockersOutOfSchool
questions.label: What stops you being physically active After School/Weekends? (please give examples)

questions.name: sickLastWeek
questions.label: Were you sick last week, or did anything prevent you from doing your normal physical activities?
